page.title: 13Day In The Life/2
page.content: 1pm.Lunch_change and feed the baby Michelle. 2pm.Sows due to farrow into clean pen,where assistance and injecting is given if needed.Teeth and tails of new born pigs cut.Young pigs injected for iron.Large sow yards cleaned out and strawed. 4pm.Boys home from school.Change Michelle and prepare tea. 4.30pm.Pigs fed once again,strawed down,watered.Boar put with sows and chickens fed and watered. 6pm.Tea_time,washing up done and children washed and ready for bed. 7.30pm.Children to bed and boys'lunches packed.Any sows farrowing during the evening are given attention.During evening time is taken up by knitting,paper work,watching T.V. or relax in a bath.
